comments:
Build ID: BIRT 2.2.0 20070329

Steps To Reproduce:
I have a report that works off a xml document.  I can preview the report on an english or french machine.  When I try to preview the report on a turkish machine I get Failed to prepare the following query for the data set type.   I will attach the report template and xml data file to this document.

More information:
I traced the problem to the 'queryText' property.  If I change the String to STRING and TimeStamp to TIMESTAMP and Double to DOUBLE it works.  It seems there's some case senstive issues on the Turkish machine compared to the english machine.

This problems is holding up the TPTP GVT testing.

Created an attachment (id=67103)
report template that produces the problem?

Created an attachment (id=67104)
xml f?le that conta?ns the data

To make the report work I had to change the follow?ng l?ne
            <property name="queryText">table0#-TNAME-#table0#:#[/descriptors/descriptor/observation]#:#{name;String;../@name},{creationTime;Timestamp;/@creationTime},{value;Double;/@value}</property>

to

            <property name="queryText">table0#-TNAME-#table0#:#[/descriptors/descriptor/observation]#:#{name;STRING;../@name},{creationTime;TIMESTAMP;/@creationTime},{value;DOUBLE;/@value}</property>
Could you attach the stack trace as well,thanks

(In reply to comment #4)
> Could you attach the stack trace as well,thanks

You can look at the generated html file here:

https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/attachment.cgi?id=63979&action=view

Also you can look at Bug #181579 for more information.

Frankly, I think Java has a problem converting 'i' to uppercase in Turkish locale the way it did in English one, we've made a little change, it should work now, please verify.
Regards

(In reply to comment #6)
> Frankly, I think Java has a problem converting 'i' to uppercase in Turkish

> Regards

I tried this build and got the same error.

The fix should not be in that build.
Try to download http://www.eclipse.org/downloads/download.php?file=/datatools/downloads/drops/N_DTP_1.5/dtp-sdk_1.5RC2_N052407.zip
and extract to the build you've got.
